# ListItemTint

**Structure**

A tint effect configuration that you can apply to content in a list.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ListItemTint
```

## Overview

Use one of these tint values with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/listItemTint(_:)] view modifier. The containing list applies the tint in a platform-specific way.

## Getting list item tint options

- **monochrome**: A standard grayscale tint effect.
- **fixed(_:)**: An explicit tint color.
- **preferred(_:)**: An explicit tint color that the system can override.

## Configuring rows

- **listItemTint(_:)**: Sets a fixed tint color for content in a list.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: An explicit tint color that the system can override.
items.name: preferred(_:)

items.description: Sets a fixed tint color for content in a list.
items.name: listItemTint(_:)
